bug.author: brollb
bug.description: Restarting jobs often results in a tweensContainer bug. It is relatively harmless but can sometimes disrupt other functionality

comments.comment:
Should be fixed as of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dfst/webgme-fab/pull/38>dfst/webgme-fab#38</denchmark-link>
Running deepforge update --git may be required to update the project and dependencies
